title: Smart Data models - PVArrayConnectionTerminal schema derived from the open connectivity foundation repository https://github.com/openconnectivityfoundation/IoTDataModels
description: This Resource describes functions for the control and monitoring of IEC 61850 based PV Array system connection terminal.

ratedarrayvoltage.description: Property. Rated voltage of array (Nominal values of maximum power voltage * number of modules) (V)

ratedarraycurrent.description: Property. Rated current of array (Nominal values of maximum power current * number of modules) (A), defined at manufacturing time.

arrayvoltage.description: Property. Output voltage of array in volts (V).

arraycurrent.description: Property. Output current of array in Ampere (A).

leakagecurrent.description: Property. The leakage current in mA.

insulationresistance.description: Property. Insulation resistance of circuit breaker (M Ohm).

timestamp.description: Property. An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Note that 1/100 time resolution should be used.

n.description: Property. Friendly name of the Resource

if.description: Property. The OCF Interface set supported by this Resource.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be PVArrayConnectionTerminal
